title: scrubs S1E1

Word does get around, Ms Out-For-Herself. So you can dump on everyone here if you want, but you will not hurt me. Her name's Carla, by the way. Hey, champ. First night on call starts soon, huh? You must be excited. You betcha. About Mrs Pratt. I heard you wanted to put her on the hospital's transplant list.
